summary: Adds 'Angelic Halos' and 'Demonic Horns' for your characters of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1971/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/MFH9yvd.png[/img][/url][line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cW1KG.png[/img][/center]
[center]
This mod adds craftable [size=4][b][color=#f4a460]Halos[/color][/b][/size] and [size=4][b][color=#f4a460]Horns[/color][/b][/size] to the game of Skyrim

This mod was mainly made to accompany the [size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10658]'FavoredSouls Angels in Skyrim'[/url][/size] mod.
With the addition of wings, why not have halos and horns aswell!?

[b][/b]
[b][color=#f4a460][size=4].:[/size][/color] Uses Slot [[color=#f4a460]#55[/color]] [color=#f4a460][size=4]:.[/size][/color][/b]


[size=4][b]- May look bland/matt with ENB and lighting shaders - FXAA PPI is fine -[/b][/size][/center]


[center][youtube]psiSO1qTcCI[/youtube] [youtube]n8UsybNSwDQ[/youtube]
[size=1](The video on the left shows v1.2, and thus shows the smaller outdated fallen halos - The video on the right shows v1.5)[/size][/center]


[center][size=4][b][color=#f4a460].:[/color] Thank you so much for the [color=#f4a460]500+[/color] Endorsements [color=#f4a460]:.[/color][/b][/size][/center]


The Halo will Glow/Ignite when worn by any character, and will [b]not[/b] use an already assigned armour slot. You can use this freely with helmets,robes and circlets simultaneously.
Companions can also use this mod. Just give them either the horns or a halo and they will automatically equip it.




[img]http://i.imgur.com/Brwj4.png[/img]
You can craft the Halos and Horns using any Forge under the [color=#f4a460][b]'Jewelry'[/b][/color] section.
To craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Flaming Demonic Horns'[/b][/color] you need to be at a [color=#f4a460][b]SkyForge[/b][/color].


To craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Angelic Halo'[/b][/color] you will need 1 of each of the 6 'Flawless' gems:
[list][*] 1 Flawless Amethyst
[*] 1 Flawless Diamond
[*] 1 Flawless Emerald
[*] 1 Flawless Garnet
[*] 1 Flawless Ruby
[*] 1 Flawless Sapphire
[/list]

To craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Fallen Halo'[/b][/color] you will need 1 of each of the 6 gems (+1 more gem of the relevant colour for the colour variants):
[list][*] 1 Amethyst
[*] 1 Diamond
[*] 1 Emerald
[*] 1 Garnet
[*] 1 Ruby
[*] 1 Sapphire
[/list]

To craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Demonic Horns'[/b][/color] you will need:
[list][*] 2 Mammoth Tusks
[*] 1 Flawless Ruby
[*] 2 Fire Salts
[/list]

To craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Flaming Demonic Horns'[/b][/color] you will need:
[list][*] 1 Demonic Horns
[*] 2 Fire Salts
[/list]



User [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3937887][b]'shadowking66'[/b][/url] suggested [i]"Maybe a black/blood red halo. Or a halo on fire. Black flames maybe?"[/i]
Seemed like an interesting concept. How'd it turn out?

I've added flaming horns with v1.3 as an upgraded form of the standard horns. It gives 50% resistance to flames and has fire on the tips of the horns. It can only be crafted using a SkyForge.
I'm not sure I like the overall look of the flaming horns myself, it looks slightly off. We shall see...

Special Thanks to user [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3986831][b]'kalthrok'[/b][/url] as he sent me the files of his various re-textures for the colour variants. I took those files, edited them (a lot), and added them to the main files (with persmission).


[center]As many people have been asking about it, the Daedric armour retexture I'm using in the screenshots is:
'[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3104][b]Daedric Armor and weapon Improvement[/b][/url]' [size=1][i][b]by GarryG[/b][/i][/size][/center]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/iZy5l.png[/img]
[list]
[*] Download with Nexus Mod Manager and make sure its checked under the Mods tab.
[*] Or download manualy and extract to your Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Then make sure the 'Angelic_Demonic.esp' file is active in the Data section of your SkyrimLauncher.exe.
[/list]



[img]http://i.imgur.com/JJ6mB.png[/img]
[u][b]v1.6[/b][/u]
- Added two new horn variants

[u][b]v1.5[/b][/u]
- Added 4 new colour variants of the 'Fallen Halo' (White, Green, Pink, Red)
- Tweaked 'Demonic Horns' textures
- 'Ao no Exorcist' horns now engulf the character in blue flames when worn

[u][b]v1.4.1[/b][/u]
- Brightened 'Fallen Halo' flames

[u][b]v1.4[/b][/u]
- Improved 'Fallen Halo' flames
- Halo flames now give off vapour distortion
- Added craftable blue flamed version of the 'Fallen Halo'

[u][b]v1.3[/b][/u]
- Increased flame height and intensity of the 'Fallen Halo'
- Increased 'Demonic Horns' glow intensity
- Added 'Flaming Demonic Horns'

[u][b]v1.2[/b][/u]
- Added 'Fallen Halo' for those corrupt angels out there
- Darkened 'Demonic Horns' texture
- Lowered original Halo height (optional file still makes it lower)

[u][b]v1.1[/b][/u]
- Added 'Demonic Horns' for those of you who follow unlawful characters
- Tweaked Halo to not give of a dull yellowish tint when indoors or by a large light source
- Slight mod name change

[u][b]v1.0[/b][/u]
- Initial release
- Adds craftable Halo to the game




[img]http://i.imgur.com/JkeBa.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13133/?]Dwemer Goggles and Scouter[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7804/?]ENB FXAA SweetFX Manager and Remover[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33391/?]Face Masks of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12322/?]God of War - Blades of Chaos and Athena[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12720/?]God of War - Blade of Olympus[/url]
